prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Garrett's The Girl in the Black Raincoat, Accession #7654-f, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1991 April 22.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection of George Garrett manuscripts, 1966, includes uncorrected Galley Proofs, corrected galley proofs and page proofs of the book of short stories and poems edited by Garrett.

did.unittitle: Manuscript of The Girl in the Black Raincoat,1966

scopecontent.p: Edited by George Garrett, Uncorrected Galley Proofs, 110 sheets, published by Duell, Sloan and Pearce, New York.

unittitle.title: The Girl in the Black Raincoat,

scopecontent.p: Edited by George Garrett, Corrected Galley Proofs, with typescript introductory notes about each author attached to the beginning galley sheet of each of their stories, 110 sheets, published by Duell, Sloan and Pearce, New York.

unittitle.title: The Girl in the Black Raincoat,

scopecontent.p: Edited by George Garrett, published by Duell, Sloan and Pearce, New York.
